data.title: Find A Chapter
data.meta_description: Interfraternity Council (IFC) | Multi-Cultural Greek Council (MCGC) | National Pan-Hellenic Council (NPHC) | Panhellenic Council (PHC) CalGreeks fraternity and sorority chapters are members of one of four councils: IFC, MCGC,
data.text:
Interfraternity Council (IFC) | Multi-Cultural Greek Council (MCGC) | National Pan-Hellenic Council (NPHC) | Panhellenic Council (PHC)

CalGreeks fraternity and sorority chapters are members of one of four councils: IFC, MCGC, NPHC, and PHC. Each fraternity/sorority chapter is listed within its council and sorted alphabetically, including its address (where applicable) and type (Fraternity or Sorority).

Interfraternity Council (IFC)

Organization Address Type Policy re: Alcohol & Housing Alpha Delta Phi 2422 Prospect Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy Alpha Epsilon Pi 2430 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy Alpha Gamma Omega 2713 Haste Street Fraternity ~See IFC policy Alpha Sigma Phi 2498 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy Alpha Tau Omega 2327 Warring Street Fraternity Alcohol & Substance Free Facility Delta Upsilon 2425 Warring Street Fraternity Alcohol & Substance Free Facility per HQ Kappa Alpha Order 2425 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy Kappa Delta Rho 2739 Channing Way Fraternity ~See IFC policy Phi Delta Theta 2726 Channing Way Fraternity Alcohol & Substance Free Facility per HQ Phi Kappa Psi 2424 Warring Street Fraternity ~See IFC policy Phi Kappa Sigma 2320 Warring Street Fraternity ~See IFC policy Phi Kappa Tau 2335 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy Pi Kappa Alpha 2324 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy Pi Lambda Phi 2727 Channing Way Fraternity ~See IFC policy Sigma Alpha Mu 2714 Durant Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy Sigma Chi 2345 College Avenue Fraternity No Hard Alcohol Allowed at Facility per HQ Sigma Nu 2710 Bancroft Way Fraternity ~See IFC policy Sigma Pi 2434 Warring Street Fraternity ~See IFC policy Tau Kappa Epsilon 2725 Channing Way Fraternity ~See IFC policy Theta Chi 2499 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy Theta Xi 2639 Durant Avenue Fraternity ~See IFC policy

Expansions:

^ACACIA is continuing to expand (starting a chapter of their fraternity) this semester.

~Per the IFC Policy, no hard alcohol (defined as anything above 15% ABV) is not permitted at any social event.

Multi-Cultural Greek Council (MCGC)

Organization Address Type alpha Kappa Delta Phi — Sorority Alpha Epsilon Omega — Fraternity Delta Xi Phi — Sorority Gamma Rho Lambda — Sorority Gamma Zeta Alpha — Fraternity Lambda Theta Alpha — Sorority Lambda Theta Nu — Sorority Lambda Theta Phi — Fraternity Lambda Upsilon Lambda — Fraternity Phi Lambda Rho — Sorority Phi Sigma Rho — Sorority Sigma Epsilon Omega — Fraternity Sigma Omicron Pi — Sorority Sigma Pi Alpha — Sorority Sigma Psi Zeta — Sorority

National Pan-Hellenic Council (NPHC)

Organization Address Type Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc. — Sorority Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity Inc. — Fraternity Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc. — Sorority Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc. — Fraternity Omega Psi Phi Fraternity, Inc. — Fraternity Sigma Gamma Rho Sorority, Inc. — Sorority Zeta Phi Beta Sorority, Inc. — Sorority

Panhellenic Council (PHC)

Organization Address Type Alpha Chi Omega 2313 Warring Street Sorority Alpha Delta Pi 2400 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity Alpha Phi 2830 Bancroft Steps Fraternity Chi Omega 2421 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity Delta Delta Delta 2300 Warring Street Fraternity Delta Gamma 2710 Channing Way Sorority Delta Sigma 2311 Prospect Street Sorority Gamma Phi Beta 2732 Channing Way Sorority Kappa Alpha Theta 2723 Durant Avenue Sorority Kappa Kappa Gamma 2328 Piedmont Avenue Sorority Pi Beta Phi 2409 Warring Street Sorority Sigma Kappa 2325 Piedmont Avenue Sorority Zeta Tau Alpha 2401 Piedmont Avenue Sorority

The following groups are NOT RECOGNIZED by the University and are not subject to oversight by University staff. Some groups (indicated by a **) are known to undertake recruitment. Students are STRONGLY RECOMMENDED to not join these groups.

Organization Address Type Reason for Loss of Recognition **Alpha Delta Chi 2730 Dwight Way Sorority Membership requirements do not align with University policy Chi Phi 2722 Durant Avenue Fraternity Hazing Chi Psi 2311 Piedmont Avenue Fraternity Hazing; HQ closed the chapter Delta Chi — Fraternity Hazing, risk management violations, and non-compliance with prior sanctions **Delta Kappa Epsilon 2302 Piedmont Ave Fraternity Hazing, risk management violations, fire and life safety violations, and non-compliance with prior sanctions

Not allowed to host any event with alcohol through 8/31/2024; issued by their Headquarters Lambda Phi Epsilon — Fraternity Risk management violations **Phi Gamma Delta (Fiji) 2395 Piedmont Ave Fraternity Hazing, risk management violations, and fire and life safety violations Pi Alpha Phi — Fraternity HQ suspended the chapter Pi Kappa Phi 2908 Channing Way Fraternity Hazing, HQ closed the chapter **Sigma Alpha Epsilon 2722 Bancroft Avenue Fraternity Hazing **Sigma Phi Omega — Sorority Hazing **Sigma Phi Society 2307 Piedmont Ave Fraternity Has never pursued recognition **Theta Delta Chi 2647 Durant Avenue Fraternity Hazing **Zeta Psi 2728 Bancroft Way Fraternity Repeated risk management violations, fire and life safety violations, and non-compliance with prior sanctions

Updated: Fall 2023
